data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Renner, Matt A. M., Devos, Nicolas, Patino, Jairo, Brown, Elizabeth A., Orme, Andrew, Elgey, Michael, Wilson, Trevor C., Gray, Lindsey J., Konrat, Matt J. von (2013): Integrative taxonomy resolves the cryptic and pseudo-cryptic Radula buccinifera complex (Porellales, Jungermanniopsida), including two reinstated and five new species. PhytoKeys 27: 1-113, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.27.5523, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.27.5523
